mapper.select: SELECT p.MTMR_NO mtmrNo, m.uktk_no uktkNo, m.MTMR_NM mtmrNm, m.TNT_NM tntNm, p.REC_REG_USER_ID recRegUserId, p.REC_REG_YMD recRegYmd, p.REC_REG_JKK recRegJkk FROM PDF_HKK_LOG p INNER JOIN MTMR m ON p.MTMR_NO = m.MTMR_NO INNER JOIN DW_APPLICATION_COM cm ON m.uktk_no = cm.uktk_no WHERE p.LINKED_FLG = 0
